description: Calculate the orbital separation evolution during RLOF.
instructions: Using the MESA outputs with the same parameters as the paper (Z = 0.0019, initial period P = 100 days, and initial masses (M1, M2) = (18, 15), (20, 17), (38, 30) M☉), calculate the initial orbital separation in solar radii and the orbital separation at RLOF detachment. Return these two values.
output_justification: From Section 3 of the paper: 'The binaries started with an initial separation of ∼ 300 R☉ and widen to ∼ 380 R☉ days by RLOF detachment.'
